response.explanation: Hello! How can I assist you with your microwave settings today?
To reheat a pizza, set the microwave to a medium power level to heat evenly. The timer is set to 2 minutes. You can pause the process anytime to check if the pizza is warm enough for your taste.
response.additional_info: Always be careful when handling hot food. The time and settings are only an initial estimate. Adjust according to your preference.
